DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Europe. The aim of this study is to demonstrate the clinical effectiveness and safety of liraglutide and dipeptidyl peptidase-4 (DPP-4) inhibitor therapy in routine primary care in Europe.
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Collection of Effectiveness and Safety Data From Patients Treated With Liraglutide or DPP-4 Inhibitor in Primary Care in Europe
DOC.criteria: Patients treated with liraglutide or DPP4 inhibitors, according to license in respective participating country with data available for 12 (+/ 2) months Patients treated with liraglutide or DPP4 inhibitors, outside of license in respective participating country
